query: INSERT INTO Battle_Stats(uid, chat_id, battles_total, battles_won, win_streak_current) VALUES ($1, $2, 1, 1, 1) ON CONFLICT (uid, chat_id) DO UPDATE SET battles_total = Battle_Stats.battles_total + 1, battles_won = Battle_Stats.battles_won + 1, win_streak_current = Battle_Stats.win_streak_current + 1 RETURNING battles_total, battles_won, win_streak_max, win_streak_current
